birth_information.birth_event: Marked with a Yuletide thanksgiving celebration.

achievements: Vision of helping those with less in life.
Established the Angeles Academy in 1931, the first private school in Pampanga.

experience.description: Found the first private school in Pampanga, aiming to provide education to students.
Re-established a school to provide education to students with scholarships

philanthropy.description: Provided scholarships and free tuition to fire victims in Angeles City.

values: Belief in providing education to the underprivileged.
Faith in human goodness despite challenges.
Strong leadership and resolve in educational management.
